comments.text: Interesting find on Aquarius!  While not directly about hyperbaric habitat *materials*, the advanced training program hints at the practical, hands-on experience needed for undersea habitat work – exactly what I'm hunting for.  Looks like a good lead for networking and potentially getting involved in relevant projects.
